title: Blended Online Learning Strategies for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: 3+ Years of Healthcare Professional Practice Experience and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Language-Centric Training for In-Service Healthcare Professionals to Strengthen Patient Communication Competencies

learning_goals: Apply three or more effective communication strategies in a multidisciplinary team environment through virtual patient simulation.
Develop two patient education scenarios considering cultural differences using game-based learning tools.
Achieve over 85% accuracy in specialized terminology translation through simulation-based case analysis in real-time video environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
